aiVolumeRate.Wiki: Normal when 1x. When set to 0, the radius of sound becomes 0 (SE and SFX are unrelated game-like parameters).

spEffectIdOnHit0.Wiki: When the character steps on the hit material, the set special effect 0 is exhibited.

spEffectIdOnHit1.Wiki: When the character steps on the hit material, the set special effect 1 is exhibited.

floorHeightType.Wiki: For floating items such as the surface of the water
